mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_customer_evaluate( id, customer_id, customer_eval_type, contract_id, payment_id, plan_pay_date, pay_date, point, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{customer.id}, #{customerEvalType}, #{contractId}, #{paymentId}, #{planPayDate}, #{payDate}, #{point}, #{createDate} )
